name: NeonBoost!
description:
*This game is designed and optimized for mobile devices. Take a look of it in Play Store*  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.AJ.Neon_Boost

************************* INSTRUCTIONS *************************

To play, you just have to clic the screen, and the spaceship will make a forward dash guided to the direction the ship is looking in that exact moment. 

Try to avoid the walls and the obstacles. If you hit with any of them, you will have to restart the level!

************************* INSTRUCTIONS *************************

Cheer up, IT IS NOT AN EASY GAME, but you can test with it your patience and aim!
